Legal_Issue: Whether the Immigration Appeal Division (IAD) erred in concluding that Ms. Kaur Gill's marriage was primarily for immigration purposes and whether it applied the correct version of section 4 of the Regulations
Legal_Provision: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Primary purpose of marriage was immigration
Regulation_Cited: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Legal_Standard: Genuine marriage not entered into primarily for immigration benefits
Application_Factor: Amended version of section 4 applied because hearing occurred after September 30, 2010
Decision_Review_Issue: Erroneous conclusion on primary purpose and incorrect application of regulation
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Cause_of_Refusal: Marriage found to be primarily for immigration purposes
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to IAD's interpretation and application of section 4
